CheckTitle: Ensure that all Azure VNets have DDoS protection enabled
Description: This check verifies that all Virtual Networks (VNets) in Azure have Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) protection enabled to safeguard against potential DDoS attacks.
Risk: Without DDoS protection, VNets are vulnerable to DDoS attacks, which can lead to service disruptions, increased latency, and potential data breaches.

Recommendation.Text: Enable DDoS protection for all Azure VNets to protect against potential DDoS attacks.
